fields_of_interest: Competition, Environment, Single market, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: We follow all rail -related topics. This includes the 4th Rail Package, the revision of rail passenger rights, access to facilities implementing act, all rail corridor initiatives and the work of the European Agency for Railways.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: To represent private passenger rail companies and pursiue the full market opening of rail markets across Europe.
relevant_communication: We publish position papers, press releases and on occasion hold events to promote our issues.
